1. ELI implementation methodology - Good practices and guidelines 

https://publications.europa.eu/s/hPod
text_norm: 1 eli implementation methodology - good practice guideline http publications.europa.eu hpod

heading: 2. ELI - A technical implementation guide
text_raw:
2. ELI - A technical implementation guide 

http://bookshop.europa.eu/en/eli-pbOA0415859/ 

ELI Video 

The ELI steering committee has also produced an informative video 
that is available in 24 languages. 

More Information on the ELI URI schema 

Information on the structure of the ELI URI schema and how it will be implemented on the 
eISB is set out below...... 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ELI URI general template components 

Name 

Comments 

eli 

Jurisdiction 

Jurisdiction 

Use of DCTERMS.ISO3166 : 2 alpha country codes, e.g. ‘LU’ 
For international organisations, the registered domain name can be used: 
e.g. ‘EU’ or ‘WTO’ 

Agent 

Administrative hierarchical structure, e.g. Federal States, constitutional 
court, parliament, etc. 

Sub-agent 

Administrative hierarchical substructure, e.g. the responsible ministry 

Reference 

Year 

YYYY 
Various interpretations allowed depending on countries’ requirements, 
e.g. date of signature or date of publication, etc. 

Month 

Day 

Type 

MM 

DD 

Nature of the act (law, decree, draft bill, etc.) 
Various interpretations depending on countries’ requirements 

Sub-type 

Sub-category of an act depending on countries’ requirements (e.g. 
corrigendum) 

Domain 

Can be used if acts are classified by themes, e.g. codes 

Natural 
identifier 

Reference or number to distinguish an act of same nature signed or 
published on the same day 

Subdivision 

Level 1 

Reference to a subdivision of an act, e.g. Article 15 

Level 2 

Reference to a smaller subdivision than level 1, 
e.g. Article 15.2 

Level 3 

Reference to a smaller subdivision than level 2 

Level n 

Reference to a smaller subdivision 

Point in time Point in time 

YYYYMMDD 
Version of the act as valid at a given date 

Version 

Version 

To distinguish between original act or consolidated version 

Language 

Language 

To differ different official expressions of the same act 
Use of DCTERMS.ISO3166 : 3 alpha 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The exact syntax of the URI standard is as follows; 

/eli/ {jurisdiction}/{agent}/{sub-agent}/{year}/{month}/{day}/{type}/{Natural identifier}/{Level 
1…}/{Point in Time}/{Version}/{language} 

Using the above as a template the following edited syntax is required for the eISB; 

/eli/ {year}/ {type} / {Natural identifier}/ {Level 1…} / {Version} / {Point in Time} / {language} 

These elements would contain the following values; 

comments 

value 

2014 

Public Act 

Private Act 

Constitutional Amendment 

Statutory Instrument 

(1948 – date) 

Statutory Rules, Orders and 
Regulations 

(1922 – 1947) 

format 

yyyy 

act 

prv 

ca 

si 

sro 

cons 

nnnn 

name 

Year 

Type 

Natural ID 

Level 1 

Constitution 

9, 23, 850 

contents 
section/nnnn 
schedule 
schedule/nnnn 
article/nnnn 

contents 
section/1 
schedule 
schedule/2 
article/16 

Number of Act or SI or 
Cons. amendment 

Contents (TOC to 
Long Title) - Section 
number and Schedule 
for Acts only. - Article 
number for 
Constitution only 

Version 

enacted 

Enacted 

made 

revised 

Made 

Revised 

Point in Time 

yyyy-mm-dd 

2013-02-22 

For Revised Acts & 
Constitution 

Language 

en 

ga 

English 

Irish

Note: For SRO’s without a number assigned, a {Natural identifier} of 999...998...997 etc 
will be applied for URI identification purposes only. These numbers will not be displayed 
in the on-line lists. 

Name of SRO: 
S.I. No. 1/1923 - Gas Charges: Revocation Of Temp. Increase - Cork - Order Of 1919 
S.I. No. 1/1923 - Railway And Canal Commission (Extension Of Time) Order, 1923

1923

1b*

en

Full URI: http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/1923/sro/1a/made/en 
 http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/1923/sro/1b/made/en 

Note: For SRO’s with duplicate numbers assigned, the addition of the suffix 
“a”...”b”...”c”... etc to the {Natural identifier} will be applied for URI identification 
purposes only. These identifiers will not be displayed in the on-line lists. 

 
 
 
 
 
 Name of Revised Act: Public Transport Regulation Act 2009 (37/2009) 

Applied eISB Unique Resource Identifier (URI) standard 

{year}

1…}

Time}

2009 

act 

37 

revised 

YYYYMMDD en 

Full URI: http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2009/act/37/revised/2013-12-03/en 

Note: {Point in Time} component relates to date of latest revision however a URI not 
containing the {Point in Time} should always resolve to the latest version. 

Constitution: Latest version of the Constitution (Irish language) 

Applied eISB Unique Resource Identifier (URI) standard 

{type} 

cons 

{Point in 
Time} 

{language} 

ga 

Full URI: http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/cons/ga 

Note: Latest version relates to the latest printed version 

Constitution: Article 16 of the Constitution as at 01-11-2013 (English language) 

Applied eISB Unique Resource Identifier (URI) standard 

{type} 

cons 

{Level 1…} 

{Point in 
Time} 

{language} 

Article/16 

YYYYMMDD 

en 

Full URI: http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/cons/article/16/2013-11-01/en 

Note: {Point in Time} component relates to date of printed version 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Publishing yearly lists of legislation 

Using the ELI URI standard a yearly list of legislation is displayed by the following URI 
syntax; 
/eli/{year}/{type – “act” or “si”} 

Examples 

http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2014/act 
(will display the list of Acts (public, private and constitutional amendments) for 2014 
including bi-lingual Act titles if applicable 

 http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2014/si/ 
(will display the list of Statutory Instruments for 2014) 

Multiple format versions 

A representation URI should reference various document formats for that piece of 
legislation 

Examples 
Acts 
HTML version - 
http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2012/act/10/enacted/en/html 

Full HTML (print) version - 
http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2012/act/10/enacted/en/print 

PDF version - 
http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2012/act/10/enacted/en/pdf 

XML version - 
http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2012/act/10/enacted/en/xml 

Statutory Instruments 
HTML (and print) version - 
http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2012/si/2/made/en/html (or “print”) 

PDF version - 
http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2012/si/2/made/en/pdf

 Pillar III: rendering the ELI metadata machine-reusable - Integration of metadata into the 
legislative files (serialisation of metadata in RDFa format). 

Example of RDFa mark-up for Finance (Certain European Union and Intergovernmental 
Obligations) Act 2016 - http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/enacted/en 

<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" prefix="eli: 
http://data.europa.eu/eli/ontology# eisb: 
http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/"> 
<head> 
 <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"> 

<!-- ELI metadata --> 
<!-- ELI skeleton --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" typeof="eli:LegalResource" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en" typeof="eli:LegalExpression" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" typeof="eli:Format" /> 

<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:is_realized_by" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/enacted/en" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/enacted" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en" property="eli:is_embodied_by" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" 
/> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" property="eli:embodies" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/enacted/en" /> 

<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:has_part" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/contents" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/section/1" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/section/2" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/section/3" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/section/4" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/section/5" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/section/6" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/schedule" /> 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 <!-- Properties [Variable] --> 

<!-- Changes --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:changes" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2014/act/38/enacted" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:changes" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/1972/act/27/enacted" /> 

<!-- Date of the document --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:date_document" 
CONTENT="2016-10-26" datatype="xsd:date" /> 

<!-- Transposes --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:transposes" 
resource="http://data.europa.eu/eli/dir/2014/57/oj" /> 

<!-- Title --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en" property="eli:title" 
CONTENT="Finance (Certain European Union and Intergovernmental 
Obligations) Act 2016" xml:lang="en" LANG="en" datatype="xsd:string" /> 

<!-- Description --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en" property="eli:description" 
CONTENT="An Act to" xml:lang="en" LANG="en" datatype="xsd:string" /> 

<!-- Related to --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:related_to" 
resource="" /> 

<!-- Type of Document --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:type_document" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/resources/resource-type#ACT" /> 

<!-- Format --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" property="eli:format"

<!-- Language --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en" property="eli:language" 
resource="http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG" 
/> 

<!-- Number --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:number" content="13" 
xml:lang="en" datatype="xsd:string" /> 

<!-- end Properties [Variable] --> 

<!-- Properties [Constant] --> 
<!-- URI schema --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:uri_schema" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/pdf/ELI_URI_schema.pdf" /> 

<!-- EU OP authority table for country --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:relevant_for" 
resource="http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/atu/IRL" /> 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 <!-- Published in --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" 
property="eli:published_in" CONTENT="electronic Irish Statute Book 
(eISB)" xml:lang="en" LANG="en" datatype="xsd:string" />

<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" 
property="eli:published_in_format" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/" /> 

<!-- Publisher -->

datatype="xsd:string" /> 

<!-- Version --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted" property="eli:version" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/resources/version#ENACTED" /> 

<!-- Rightsholder --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" 
property="eli:rightsholder" CONTENT="Houses of the Oireachtas" 
xml:lang="en" LANG="en" datatype="xsd:string" /> 

<!-- Open data license --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" property="eli:licence" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/open-data.html" /> 

<!-- Legal value --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/html" property="eli:legal_value" 
resource="http://data.europa.eu/eli/ontology#LegalValue-official" /> 

<!-- end Properties [Constant] --> 

<!-- Declaration of PDF format --> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/pdf" typeof="eli:Format" />

resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/enacted/en" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en" property="eli:is_embodied_by" 
resource="http://www.irishstatutebook.ie/eli/2016/act/13/enacted/en/pdf" 
/> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/pdf" property="eli:format" 
resource="http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/application/pdf" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/pdf" property="eli:publisher" 
CONTENT="Houses of the Oireachtas" xml:lang="en" LANG="en" 
datatype="xsd:string" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/pdf" 
property="eli:published_in_format" resource="http://irishstatutebook.ie/" 
xml:lang="en" /> 
<meta about="eisb:2016/act/13/enacted/en/pdf" property="eli:legal_value" 
resource="http://data.europa.eu/eli/ontology#LegalValue-official" /> 
<!-- end Declaration of PDF format --> 

<!-- END ELI metadata -->
text_norm: 2 eli - technical implementation guide http bookshop.europa.eu en eli-pboa0415859 eli video eli steering committee also produced informative video available 24 language information eli uri schema information structure eli uri schema implemented eisb set below eli uri general template component name comment eli jurisdiction jurisdiction use dcterms.iso3166 2 alpha country code e.g lu international organisation registered domain name used e.g eu wto agent administrative hierarchical structure e.g federal state constitutional court parliament etc sub-agent administrative hierarchical substructure e.g responsible ministry reference year yyyy various interpretation allowed depending country requirement e.g date signature date publication etc month day type mm dd nature act (law decree draft bill etc.) various interpretation depending country requirement sub-type sub-category act depending country requirement (e.g corrigendum) domain used act classified theme e.g code natural identifier reference number distinguish act nature signed published day subdivision level 1 reference subdivision act e.g article 15 level 2 reference smaller subdivision level 1 e.g article 15.2 level 3 reference smaller subdivision level 2 level n reference smaller subdivision point time point time yyyymmdd version act valid given date version version distinguish original act
